title: FT/ FS: Tinker, Evers, Bender ***Lenox, Broad Leaf, Carolina Brights***

posts.post_title: FT/ FS: Tinker, Evers, Bender ***Lenox, Broad Leaf, Carolina Brights***
posts.post_content:
Greetings fellow net54 members.

I have a trio of exotic T206 available for trade or sale.

If you have any interest, please feel free to send me a PM or contact me at: [url]info@t206society.com[/url].

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek

Greetings to my fellow Monster enthusiasts.

It has been some time on this thread so I thought I would give it a friendly bump.

Thank you very much.

Derek
Derek I couldn't dare make a fair offer. I'd just like to say how jealous I am and what great cards those are !!! Especially the Uzit !

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1401438]Derek I couldn't dare make a fair offer. I'd just like to say how jealous I am and what great cards those are !!! Especially the Uzit ![/QUOTE]

Awwww shucks. Thank you Josh, but really they are just little pieces of paper. Totally awesome little pieces of paper. Remember, you cannot eat them in a time of crisis! ;)

I do thank you for the kind words :)

Derek

Greetings. I wanted to bump this thread to reflect the two new additions (Evers and Bender Carolina Brights).

If interested, please feel free to PM me or email me at: [url]info@t206society.com[/url].

Thank you very much.

Derek

Greetings. I wanted to give this thread a friendly bump to reflect some new additions.

Anyone have a spare Broad Leaf 460 just lying around? :o 

Thank you very much for your time.

Derek
I want all three!  Unfortunately, my bank account disagrees.  No way I could make a fair offer.  But damn nice cards!
